Key Match Events: DR Congo knocked Egypt out of the AFCON with an 8-7 win on penalties after the teams finished 1-1 after extra time.
Egypt goalkeeper Mohamed Abou Gabal struck the crossbar with his spot kick before Lionel Mpasi stepped up to send Congo into the quarterfinals.
Mostafa Mohamed equalized from the spot in first-half stoppage time.
Egypt finished the game with 10 players when defender Mohamed Hamdy was sent off in the first period of extra time with his second yellow card for a late challenge on Simon Banza.
